original_text: He delivered me from my strong enemy, and from them which hated me: for they were too strong for me.
korean_text: 나를 강한 원수와 미워하는 자에게서 건지셨음이여 그들은 나보다 힘이 세기 때문이로다

sentences.original_text: He delivered me from my strong enemy
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 나를 나의 강한 원수에게서 건져주셨다

sentences.original_text: and from them which hated me
for they were too strong for me
